features.additionalValue: No-obligation quotes for insurance (with an option of 90 days free building insurance cover during settlement period)

eligibility.additionalValue: PAYG income and be outside any probationary periods of employment

fees.name: MORTGAGE_ESTABLISHMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes valuation, solicitor   s fees, one Torrens title search and mortgage preparation costs. If applicable, the following fees may be summarised and presented as an Establishment Fee

fees.name: MORTGAGE_ESTABLISHMENT_FEE_EXISTING_LOAN
fees.additionalInfo: Includes, solicitor   s fees, one Torrens title search and mortgage preparation costs. If applicable, the following fees may be summarised and presented as an Establishment Fee

fees.name: VALUATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Only charged when a standard metro valuation is needed for setup or if additional valuation is required. If applicable, this fee may be summarised and presented as an Establishment Fee

fees.name: VALUATION_FEE_COUNTRY
fees.additionalInfo: Charged at-cost for non-standard valuation (e.g. country property, interstate or high-value properties)

fees.name: SWITCHING_LOAN_PRODUCTS
fees.additionalInfo: Loan switching payable when we agree to your request to change your type of home loan or your interest rate.

fees.name: PRODUCTION_OF_TITLE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Request to revise Certificate of Title held by BankVic requires consent to mortgage, ownership, including subdivisions, second mortgages, caveats in Victoria only (fee can differ in other states)

fees.name: TOP-UP_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Increase in loan amount with no valuation required. This top-up fee is waived when a standard metro valuation is required for an increase in loan amount.

fees.name: REPRESENTATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Attendance at settlement by BankVic or its representative

fees.name: SECURITY_SUBSTITUTION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Exclusive of government and other charges

fees.name: DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable upon payout of your loan if you request to discharge the mortgage. Exclusive of government and other charge

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Torrens title, where additional searches required

data.name: Home Loan Variable Rate
data.description: A low variable rate to get into your dream home sooner
